Content: A full-day Workshop on ‘Beauty Culture’ for ladies in Kilinochchi, organized by the 57 Division under the guidance of its General Officer Commanding, Major General Vijitha Ravipriya, got underway at Nelum Piyasa auditorium on Monday (4) with the intention of educating the woman-folk regarding this growing trade of income. Lions club 306 A2 in cooperation with the 574 Brigade and the Commanding Officer, 4 Sri Lanka Army Women's Corps educated Kilinochchi ladies on beauty culture, hair styles, bridal dressings, women’s rights and income generating projects. A considerable number of women participated in the arrangement.
